required.name: GEMINI_API_KEY
required.description: Primary Gemini AI API key for deepfake detection analysis. Get one from Google AI Studio.

optional.name: GEMINI_API_KEY_1
optional.description: First backup Gemini AI API key for better rate limiting and failover support

optional.name: GEMINI_API_KEY_2
optional.description: Second backup Gemini AI API key for enhanced reliability

optional.name: GEMINI_API_KEY_3
optional.description: Third backup Gemini AI API key for maximum uptime
